StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateAmmoCanLi.FromMcriss]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaRowGuid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = null, @NwaID int = null, @OldTestDate DATE, @TestDate DATE, @AmmoCanLi. int, @LastUpdateBy UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF @NwaRowGuid IS NULL AND @NwaID IS NOT NULL BEGIN SELECT @NwaRowGuid = rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID END
SELECT ppi.ID INTO #UpdateList FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect p INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst ppi ON ppi.ProspectID = p.ProspectId WHERE p.NwaId = @NwaRowGuid AND CAST(ppi.TestDate as Date) = @OldTestDate
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM #UpdateList) BEGIN UPDATE PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst SET TestDate = @TestDate, AmmoCanLi. = @AmmoCanLi., LastUpdateDate = GETDATE(), LastUpdateBy = @LastUpdateBy FROM #UpdateList p INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectPhysicalIst ppi ON ppi.ID = p.ID END ELSE BEGIN DECLARE @ProspectID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @ProspectID = ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect p WHERE p.NwaId = @NwaRowGuid
INSERT INTO PROSPECTING.USMC.[ProspectPhysicalIst] ([ID] ,[ProspectID] ,[TestDate] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[LastUpdateBy] ,[AmmoCanLi.]) VALUES (NEWID() ,@ProspectID ,@TestDate ,GETDATE() ,@LastUpdateBy ,@AmmoCanLi.)
END
DROP TABLE #UpdateList
END
